titles.title: All Hail the Power of Jesus Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All hail the power of Jesus' name!
Let angels prostrate fall (2ce)
Bring forth the royal diadem,
And crown Him (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Crown Him, ye martyrs of your God,
Who from His altar call (2ce);
Extol Him in whose path ye trod,
And crown HIm (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ye seed of Israel’s chosen race,
Ye ransomed of the fall (2ce),
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
And crown Him (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sinners, whose love can ne’er forget
The wormwood and the gall (2ce),
Go, spread your trophies at His feet,
And crown Him (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let every kindred, every tribe
On this terrestrial ball(2ce),
To Him all majesty ascribe,
And crown Him (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
O that, with yonder sacred throng,
We at His feet may fall, (2ce)
Join in the everlasting song,
And crown Him (7ce)
And crown Him Lord of all!
